short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick access dictionary to look up the meaning of words on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZumLexicon - A Simple Handy Dictionary On the Web

Reading a blog post or a web novel and you come across a new, strange, fancy word?

Want to know what it means but you don't want to have to make a new tab and search it up every time?

What if there was a tool that could allow you to search up a word without having to make a new tab and leave the comfort of your current tab?

ZumLexicon allows you to search up the meaning of words with just the click of a button. 

Simply highlight the word you want to know about and click on ZumLexicon's extension icon in the extension menu.

It's recommended to pin this extension to make it more accessible.
